snippet: The Patio at the Roundhouse at Beacon Falls, in a complex of rescued factory buildings, provides a spectacular outdoor view of Fishkill Creek.
abstract: Alice Gabriel reviews The Patio at the Roundhouse at Beacon Falls, outdoor restaurant in Beacon (Metropolitan/Westchester).
